name: Seosamh Ó hÉanaí
description: '''Joe Heaney''' (AKA '''Joe Éinniú'''; Irish: '''Seosamh Ó hÉanaí''') (1 October 1919 – 1 May 1984) was an Irish traditional ([[Sean-nós singing|sean nós]]) singer from [[Connemara]], [[County Galway]], Ireland. He spent most of his adult life abroad, living in England, Scotland and New York City, in the course of which he recorded hundreds of songs.
